description:
DANCE LIKE A STAR AT YOUR WEDDING!
Uwedding Dance provides 24/7 online access to wedding dance lessons and combinations. It leads you through a simple and effective system that can be followed to complete your first dance.


Make your first dance as special as everything else on your wedding day!

WHAT IS INCLUDED:

1.Basics of the dance

 Holds, rhythm, lead and follow

2.Dance Steps

Detailed explanation, dance steps with music and slow motion for easy viewing

3. Two Exciting and Attractive Dance Combinations

4. Wedding Dance Tips

 Performance tips, styling, recovery when you miss a step

5.What to Wear

6.Wedding Dance Song Suggestions
title: Ultimate Wedding Dance
